    • 方法详细资料

      • addEquipment

        @WriteLog(OMM_ADD_EQUIPMENT)
@RequestMapping(value="equipments",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject addEquipment​(@RequestBody
                                                    com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.pojo.omm.Equipment equipment)
        添加设备
        参数:
        name - 设备名称
        type - 设备类型（枚举）
        serviceLife - 声明周期（数值）
        status - 设备状态（枚举）
        assetNo - 资产编号（字符串）
        tunnelId - 管廊id
        venderId - 供应商id
        modelId - 设备型号id
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{}}
        date
        2018年6月13日

        添加测试数据
        返回:
        JSONObject

      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="equipments/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.omm.EquipmentVo vo)
        分页查询
        参数:
        name - 设备名称（支持模糊查询）
        type - 设备类型（枚举）
        status - 设备状态（枚举）
        assetNo - 资产编号（字符串）
        tunnelId - 管廊id
        venderId - 供应商id
        modelId - 设备型号id
        startTime - 开始时间
        endTime - 结束时间
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":11,"list":[{"id":1,"assetNo":"sn003","name":"安全防范设备3","type":1,"typeName":"安全防范","crtTime":1525406400000,"serviceLife":1000,"status":1,"statusName":"运行中","imgUrl":"\\upload\\equipment\\安全防范\\model-1\\testimg.jpg","tunnel":{"id":1,"name":"凤岭北路"},"model":{"id":1,"name":"model-1","crtTime":1531901454000},"vender":{"id":1,"name":"张三","crtTime":1531901454000}},{"id":2,"assetNo":"sn001","name":"安全防范设备1","type":1,"typeName":"安全防范","crtTime":1525406400000,"serviceLife":1000,"status":1,"statusName":"运行中","imgUrl":"\\upload\\equipment\\安全防范\\model-2\\testimg.jpg","tunnel":{"id":1,"name":"凤岭北路"},"model":{"id":2,"name":"model-2","crtTime":1531901454000},"vender":{"id":1,"name":"张三","crtTime":1531901454000}}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":2,"size":2,"startRow":1,"endRow":2,"pages":6,"prePage":0,"nextPage":2,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":true,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1,2,3,4,5,6],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":6,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":6}}
        date
        2018年5月29日
